author: Dr Ben Miles
description:
Scientists have developed a tiny retinal implant, called PRIMA, that restores central vision in patients with advanced age-related macular degeneration. This implant works with augmented reality glasses to convert infrared light into electrical signals, reactivating retinal cells and enabling patients to read again. It's awesome.

Source Article: 
https://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMoa2501396
